archimate:Node.name: Solaris VMware Platform Consolidated
archimate:Node.documentation:
All LIbrary services, ISIS, MyUWE portal, Consolidation Servers for www. are on Solaris too - so could show more platforms.
MyUWE environment has similar environment to ISIS - has 4 servers, utlises the NAS
Library services - some of - are being moved on to Consolidation Servers. (see Nick Eaton).
Plan: gradually moving Library - some of - to Consolidation Servers. Currently a shared service with Bath Spa (contact: lawrence), hosted and managed by UWE
Plan: MyUWE -> linux platform and SAN (and uses NAS not SAN currently)
NB web was put on CMS, internal web on Intranet, www is now a set of redirects - via consolidation servers.
Also couple of remaining standalone, legacy Solaris boxes
